item.description:
At the request of several player we will be having an Arkham Horror board game day. I have all expansions so feel free to request what you would like to see on the table.

 

Please see the game description on Boardgamegeek by clicking here.

 

Any questions let us know! Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: use this Mapquest link to find us: http://mapq.st/l8yqIq
item.why: At the request of several player we will be having an Arkham Horror day. I have all expansions so feel free to request what you would like to see on the table.

group.name: The Portsmouth, NH / Seacoast Boardgames Group

item.name: Arkham Horror Insanity in Brentwood
